data.headline: Aspiring Product Manager with Academic Research Experience
data.summary: Passionate academic researcher with a strong background in data analysis and problem-solving. Seeking to transition into a Product Manager role to leverage my analytical skills and drive innovation. Committed to delivering user-centric solutions that create lasting impact.

experience.title: Research Assistant
bullets: Conducted extensive literature reviews and data analysis to support research projects
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement research methodologies
Presented research findings at academic conferences, contributing to the field's knowledge base

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani

projects.name: Predictive Analytics for Customer Churn
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict customer churn for a telecommunications company, resulting in a 15% reduction in customer attrition.

projects.name: Automated Recommendation System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a content-based recommendation system for an e-commerce platform, improving user engagement and sales.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. The candidate is a young woman with dark hair, wearing a white blouse and a neutral expression, looking directly at the camera.
